original_text: Then Jesus' disciples went to him, and they said, ‘The Pharisees heard what you said. They did not agree with what you said. Do you know that?’
korean_text: 이에 제자들이 나아와 이르되 바리새인들이 이 말씀을 듣고 걸림이 된 줄 아시나이까

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus' disciples went to him,
The Pharisees heard what you said.
They did not agree with what you said.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 말한 것에 동의하지 않았습니다.
